li.label: <color=#FFDD43>Rare Genius</color>
li.description:
A poet of later times wrote of [PAWN_nameDef]:
[PAWN_nameDef]'s mighty name hangs proudly on the upper sphere; Stern and grand, the royal liege man's likeness claims respect. In the tri-part world below [PAWN_pronoun] spun deep schemes. In the age-old realm of cloud, one single plume unites our gaze. Who rank [PAWN_possessive] peers? Yi Yin and Jiang Ziya. In command [PAWN_pronoun] was more sure than Xiao or Cao. But the stars had turned, [PAWN_pronoun] could not save Han's Reign. Toiling to the end, body broken, will unbroke.

li.label: <color=#FFDD43>Bean Threading Master</color>
li.description: To a true master, bean threading is more than a job. More than an art, even. It's a way of communing with the fundamental forces of the universe, a path to enlightenment. That is what separates the master bean threader from the rest.
